<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 300, 320, 316]]<|/det|>
Paper 1 Non-calculator (Core)  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[732, 301, 905, 316]]<|/det|>
February/March 2025  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[752, 325, 905, 340]]<|/det|>
1 hour 30 minutes  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 355, 395, 370]]<|/det|>
You must answer on the question paper.  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 384, 400, 400]]<|/det|>
You will need: Geometrical instruments  

<|ref|>sub_title<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 418, 222, 433]]<|/det|>
## INSTRUCTIONS  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 435, 808, 574]]<|/det|>
INSTRUCTIONS- Answer all questions.- Use a black or dark blue pen. You may use an HB pencil for any diagrams or graphs.- Write your name, centre number and candidate number in the boxes at the top of the page.- Write your answer to each question in the space provided.- Do not use an erasable pen or correction fluid.- Do not write on any bar codes.- Calculators must not be used in this paper.- You may use tracing paper.- You must show all necessary working clearly.  

<|ref|>sub_title<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 603, 213, 617]]<|/det|>
## INFORMATION  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 619, 728, 651]]<|/det|>
INFORMATION- The total mark for this paper is 80.- The number of marks for each question or part question is shown in brackets [ ].

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[79, 121, 369, 139]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[604, 264, 687, 282]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[604, 312, 675, 330]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[604, 359, 680, 378]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[604, 408, 663, 426]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[604, 452, 680, 479]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[604, 593, 685, 621]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[154, 74, 798, 95]]<|/det|>
Kat has a method for finding the difference between two square numbers, \(a^2 - b^2\).

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[154, 92, 270, 109]]<|/det|>
Her method is

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[275, 106, 720, 126]]<|/det|>
(the sum of \(a\) and \(b\)) \(\times\) (the difference between \(a\) and \(b\)) .

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[154, 135, 447, 155]]<|/det|>
She shows her method for \(17^{2} - 13^{2}\).

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[351, 168, 546, 288]]<|/det|>
\[17^{2} - 13^{2}\] \[= (17 + 13)\times (17 - 13)\] \[= 30\times 4\] \[= 120\]

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[154, 305, 473, 325]]<|/det|>
